sub_topic: Preparation of p-nitroaniline from aniline and nitric acid
message_1: What is the optimum temperature and time required for the Preparation of p-nitroaniline from aniline and nitric acid, and how can the purity of the final product be improved?

The preparation of p-nitroaniline from aniline and nitric acid is typically done through a nitration reaction.
